title: help with font
content:
hello can anyone help me identify this font please

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [signs.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016010711/http:/typophile.com/files/signs_0.jpg) | 12.02 KB |
author: roglioro

comments.content: [Penhurst Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016010711/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/lloyd) by Paul Lloyd. There's also [Ornella](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016010711/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/ornella) by Ralph M. Unger.
